adviseScripts.text: What drives you to fight?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: What's the point of reclaiming the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: All I want is for everyone to be happy.
I want to bring an end to this war.
Happiness...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: even in the midst of such turmoil.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: You remind me of someone I know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Just like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Do you honestly believe it's possible to put an end to this conflict?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: How... optimistic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: And yet, also worrisome.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a brief conversation with Dorothy.
I heard you spent a fair amount of time on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever tried your hand at skinning a deer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: No, but I have an idea of how it's done.
Actually, I've never even come across a deer.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: If you ever get the chance to try it, you'll be surprised at how easy it is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: A deer has a lot of meat, which is great for sharing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: You can share it with... your comrades.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: That's understandable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Living beings are a rare sight on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps you'll have a chance to see one in the future.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy shares some insights about deer with me.
Do you find Eden's food to your liking?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I assume it's quite different from the cuisine in the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: It's a heavenly delight.
It's delicious, but not very convenient.
I knew you would love it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Please indulge yourself while you're here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: After all, culinary creations are Eden's pride and joy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Convenience isn't always a top priority when it comes to food.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: It can be detrimental to your quality of life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Well, since I'm not the one eating, there's no need to fuss too much about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a brief conversation with Dorothy about food.
What's your impression of the Ark?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I'm interested to hear your perspective.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: It's a good place to live.
It has its flaws.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: It seems like a place worth protecting.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: What a pity.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Even after all this time, it still has issues.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: What a sad place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Dorothy.
Isabel seems quite fond of you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: But be careful, she's more dangerous than she seems.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, I know.
How so?
So you're already aware of her nature.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: That's good to hear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Once Isabel sets her mind on something, she can be quite persistent.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: But don't worry, she won't cause any trouble for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: As a cherished guest of Eden, you are highly valued.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I have a conversation about Isabel.
How do you view the world around us?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Do you think it's fair or unfair?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: It's fair.
It's unfair.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: There are people who suffer in this world, who get sent to the frontlines,
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: and those who think they're in paradise when they're actually living underground, continuing their despicable lives.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: But you still believe it's a fair world.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I completely agree.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: If the world was fair, everyone would be living in their own paradise, wouldn't they?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a brief conversation with Dorothy.
Do you believe in the idea of karma?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: That actions have consequences and people who do bad things will eventually get what's coming to them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Yes, I think it's true.
It's hard to say.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: However, the wretched scum always manage to escape their just desserts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: That's a realistic answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: The unfortunate truth is that not everyone can be punished for their wrongdoings.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: ... That's why I can't stop myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I discuss a bitter topic.
I heard you're known as Mankind's Hope in the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: How does it feel to carry the hopes of everyone in the Ark?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: It feels like a heavy burden.
It's motivating.
I can imagine it weighs heavily on you. And yet, you're persevering.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: But remember, with the weight of hope comes the burden of revenge.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: If someone betrays you, you must repay the same weight of betrayal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I see, your optimism is just... admirable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: But don't let it get to your head.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Remember, the opposite of hope is betrayal.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a sincere conversation with Dorothy.
How's life treating you in Eden?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Are you all comfortable?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: It's absolutely perfect, I couldn't ask for more.
It's not ideal, I feel suffocated at times.
That's great to hear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: But I suppose those from the Ark won't be pleased to hear that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: The amenities and meals here are impeccable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Maybe it's a matter of your mindset?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a brief conversation with Dorothy.
Noah is quite endearing, isn't she?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: And she's so obedient.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I-I suppose so.
Hehe, I can tell you're surprised.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I know Noah's true nature when she's with other people.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to agree just to please me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I know Noah's personality inside out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: And that's why it's especially adorable when she listens to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I chat about Noah.
You seem to have a close relationship with the Nikkes by your side.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: If I may ask, how do you see them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: They're my comrades in life and death.
They're like family to me.
I see. It's clear that you're willing to put your life on the line for them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Your bond with your comrades is truly...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: admirable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Family?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I'm sorry, but I don't see how humans and Nikkes can be considered family.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a brief conversation with Dorothy.
We discovered three Nikkes on the surface again today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: ... It's distressing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: What is their condition?
Did you see them off properly?
... Condition?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Unfortunately, the Nikkes we come across in this area are already beyond saving.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: We make sure to pay our respects and offer them a dignified farewell.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: ... I have faith that they have moved on to a better place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I discuss a sobering topic.
*Sigh*
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I haven't had a nightmare in ages. It feels awful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Did you dream about ghosts?
Did you dream about falling from the Elevator?
Ghosts...
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I suppose it would be nice if I could see her again,
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: even if only in my dreams.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, it looks like you have those nightmares often.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I'm a little envious.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: My nightmares are more complicated than that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I have a conversation about dreams.
You're always up so early.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Don't you ever want to sleep in?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I guess it's because this isn't my home.
Maybe I'm feeling a bit anxious.
I'm a bit surprised that you're still struggling to sleep in new places, given that you're always up on the surface for missions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: ... Well, it's always nice to have a home to come back to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I hope it's not because of me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: If you're having trouble sleeping in this environment, we can make changes to accommodate you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: But I'm afraid replacing me isn't an option.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a brief conversation with Dorothy.
Do you have an appreciation for flowers?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: There are beautiful white lilies blooming in the patio. We should go check them out later.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: What's the scent of lilies like?
What do lilies look like?
They have a rich fragrance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: No matter where they are, the aroma they leave behind is potent.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: In fact, their scent is still lingering on me now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: They're pure white flowers,
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: and their petals spread outwards.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I converse about lilies.
I heard you called for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Is there anything you need?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I just wanted to chat with you.
I have a question for you.
A chat, you say?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: That's... unexpected.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: It's been a while since I've had a leisurely conversation.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Certainly, what's on your mind?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I'm willing to answer any questions as long as they do not breach any security protocols.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a chat with Dorothy.
I'm curious to know,
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: do you think Eden has any flaws?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: No. It's perfect.
It's missing a certain warmth.
I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: So, in your eyes,
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: this is what paradise truly means.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: The heating system is functioning properly.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Are you referring to the warmth in personal relationships?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: ... I'm quite intrigued as to what kind of warmth you're talking about.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I haven't felt that in a long time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I have a discussion about Eden.
I'm feeling curious, so I have a question for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Do you think we can reclaim the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I think it's achievable.
I'm not entirely certain.
You sound pretty confident.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: With you here, I believe we have a chance at success.
Putting your life on the line for something uncertain?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: That takes real courage.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I have a brief conversation with Dorothy.
I personally designed the room you're staying in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: What do you think of it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Pink seems to be your favorite color.
I appreciate the subtle touches of pink.
Yes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I suppose I do have a thing for pink.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: But out of all the other colors, you mentioned pink. I suppose it's not to your taste?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for the feedback.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I try to incorporate pink in subtle ways so that it doesn't overwhelm the room's aesthetic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I chat about pink.
Isn't the weather lovely today?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Do you have a favorite type of weather?
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: I enjoy sunny and warm weather.
I prefer rainy and cool weather.
I like sunny days too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: When I sit under my parasol and feel the warmth of the sun on my skin,
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: it's like all my troubles just melt away.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: So you're a fan of rainy days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Personally, I much prefer sunny days.
adviseScripts.speaker: Dorothy

adviseScripts.text: Dorothy and I have a conversation about weather.
